info.title: Billing Document - Read Subsequent Billing Documents
info.description:
SAP Self-Billing Cockpit uses this service to retrieve details about billing documents in your system that were created with reference to existing billing documents in your system. For example, if a credit memo was created with reference to an invoice, the invoice is the preceding billing document and the credit memo is the subsequent billing document. The service makes the subsequent billing document's data available through a single service entity.

This service is intended solely for the integration between SAP S/4HANA Cloud and SAP Self-Billing Cockpit and should not be used for any other purposes.

x-sap-shortText: Read information about a billing document's subsequent billing documents with this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads selected header and item fields of all billing documents created with reference to billing documents.
get.description: Reads selected header and item-level details of billing documents in your system that were created with reference to existing billing documents. Examples of retrieved fields include the SD document category and process flow level.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: BillingDocumentItem
parameters.description: Preceding Item of an SD Document

parameters.name: SubsequentDocumentItem
parameters.description: Subsequent Item of an SD Document

get.summary: Read data from a subsequent billing document for a specific (preceding) billing document item and subsequent billing document item.
get.description: Reads selected header and item-level details of billing documents in your system that were created with reference to existing billing documents. Consumers must pass the following key fields: billing document, billing document item, subsequent billing document and subsequent billing document item. Examples of retrieved fields include the SD document category and process flow level.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_SubsqntBillgDocForSelfBillg HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
